verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Again, thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> to <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Whosoever <S%H376><s%> <S%H376><s%> he be of the children <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> or of <S%H4480><s%> the strangers <S%H1616><s%> that sojourn <S%H1481><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that <S%H834><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> any of his seed <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2233><s%> unto Molech; <S%H4432><s%> he shall surely be put to death: <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall stone <S%H7275><s%> him with stones. <S%H68><s%>

And I <S%H589><s%> will set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against that <S%H1931><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> and will cut him off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H853><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> his people; <S%H5971><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he hath given <S%H5414><s%> of his seed <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2233><s%> unto Molech, <S%H4432><s%> to <S%H4616><s%> defile <S%H2930><s%> <S%H853><s%> my sanctuary, <S%H4720><s%> and to profane <S%H2490><s%> <S%H853><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> name. <S%H8034><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> do any ways hide <S%H5956><s%> <S%H5956><s%> <S%H853><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%> from the man, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H1931><s%> when he giveth <S%H5414><s%> of his seed <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2233><s%> unto Molech, <S%H4432><s%> and kill <S%H4191><s%> him not: <S%H1115><s%>

Then I <S%H589><s%> will set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H853><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against that <S%H1931><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> and against his family, <S%H4940><s%> and will cut him off, <S%H3772><s%> <S%H853><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that go a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him, to commit whoredom <S%H2181><s%> with <S%H310><s%> Molech, <S%H4432><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> their people. <S%H5971><s%>

And the soul <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H834><s%> turneth <S%H6437><s%> after <S%H413><s%> such as have familiar spirits, <S%H178><s%> and after <S%H413><s%> wizards, <S%H3049><s%> to go a whoring <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them, I will even set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> against that <S%H1931><s%> soul, <S%H5315><s%> and will cut him off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H853><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> his people. <S%H5971><s%>
Sanctify yourselves <S%H6942><s%> therefore, and be <S%H1961><s%> ye holy: <S%H6918><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
And ye shall keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them: I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> which sanctify <S%H6942><s%> you.

For <S%H3588><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> curseth <S%H7043><s%> <S%H853><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> or his mother <S%H517><s%> shall be surely put to death: <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191><s%> he hath cursed <S%H7043><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> or his mother; <S%H517><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be upon him.

And the man <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> committeth adultery <S%H5003><s%> with <S%H854><s%> another man's <S%H376><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> even he that <S%H834><s%> committeth adultery <S%H5003><s%> with <S%H854><s%> his neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> the adulterer <S%H5003><s%> and the adulteress <S%H5003><s%> shall surely be put to death. <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191><s%>

And the man <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> lieth <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H854><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> wife <S%H802><s%> hath uncovered <S%H1540><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> nakedness: <S%H6172><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them shall surely be put to death; <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191><s%> their blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be upon them.

And if <S%H834><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> lie <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H854><s%> his daughter-in-law, <S%H3618><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them shall surely be put to death: <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191><s%> they have wrought <S%H6213><s%> confusion; <S%H8397><s%> their blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be upon them.

If <S%H834><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> also lie <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H854><s%> mankind, <S%H2145><s%> as he lieth <S%H4904><s%> with a woman, <S%H802><s%> both <S%H8147><s%> of them have committed <S%H6213><s%> an abomination: <S%H8441><s%> they shall surely be put to death; <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191><s%> their blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be upon them.

And if <S%H834><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> and her mother, <S%H517><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is wickedness: <S%H2154><s%> they shall be burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> both he and they; that there be <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> wickedness <S%H2154><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you.

And if <S%H834><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> lie <S%H5414><s%> <S%H7903><s%> with a beast, <S%H929><s%> he shall surely be put to death: <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191><s%> and ye shall slay <S%H2026><s%> the beast. <S%H929><s%>

And if <S%H834><s%> a woman <S%H802><s%> approach <S%H7126><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> beast, <S%H929><s%> and lie down <S%H7250><s%> thereto, thou shalt kill <S%H2026><s%> <S%H853><s%> the woman, <S%H802><s%> and the beast: <S%H929><s%> they shall surely be put to death; <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191><s%> their blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be upon them.

And if <S%H834><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> his sister, <S%H269><s%> his father's <S%H1><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> or <S%H176><s%> his mother's <S%H517><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> her nakedness, <S%H6172><s%> and she <S%H1931><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> his nakedness; <S%H6172><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is a wicked thing; <S%H2617><s%> and they shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of their people: <S%H1121><s%> <S%H5971><s%> he hath uncovered <S%H1540><s%> his sister's <S%H269><s%> nakedness; <S%H6172><s%> he shall bear <S%H5375><s%> his iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

And if <S%H834><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> shall lie <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H854><s%> a woman <S%H802><s%> having her sickness, <S%H1739><s%> and shall uncover <S%H1540><s%> <S%H853><s%> her nakedness; <S%H6172><s%> he hath discovered <S%H6168><s%> <S%H853><s%> her fountain, <S%H4726><s%> and she <S%H1931><s%> hath uncovered <S%H1540><s%> <S%H853><s%> the fountain <S%H4726><s%> of her blood: <S%H1818><s%> and both <S%H8147><s%> of them shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> their people. <S%H5971><s%>

And thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> uncover <S%H1540><s%> the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of thy mother's <S%H517><s%> sister, <S%H269><s%> nor of thy father's <S%H1><s%> sister: <S%H269><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> he uncovereth <S%H6168><s%> <S%H853><s%> his near kin: <S%H7607><s%> they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their iniquity. <S%H5771><s%>

And if <S%H834><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> shall lie <S%H7901><s%> with <S%H854><s%> his uncle's wife, <S%H1733><s%> he hath uncovered <S%H1540><s%> his uncle's <S%H1730><s%> nakedness: <S%H6172><s%> they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their sin; <S%H2399><s%> they shall die <S%H4191><s%> childless. <S%H6185><s%>

And if <S%H834><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> his brother's <S%H251><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> it <S%H1931><s%> is an unclean thing: <S%H5079><s%> he hath uncovered <S%H1540><s%> his brother's <S%H251><s%> nakedness; <S%H6172><s%> they shall be <S%H1961><s%> childless. <S%H6185><s%>

Ye shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> my judgments, <S%H4941><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them: that the land, <S%H776><s%> whither <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> I <S%H589><s%> bring <S%H935><s%> you to dwell <S%H3427><s%> therein, spew you not out. <S%H6958><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3808><s%>

And ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> in the manners <S%H2708><s%> of the nation, <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I <S%H589><s%> cast out <S%H7971><s%> before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you: for <S%H3588><s%> they committed <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these things, <S%H428><s%> and therefore I abhorred <S%H6973><s%> them.

But I have said <S%H559><s%> unto you, Ye <S%H859><s%> shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> <S%H853><s%> their land, <S%H127><s%> and I <S%H589><s%> will give <S%H5414><s%> it unto you to possess <S%H3423><s%> it, a land <S%H776><s%> that floweth <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey: <S%H1706><s%> I <S%H589><s%> am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have separated <S%H914><s%> you from <S%H4480><s%> other people. <S%H5971><s%>

Ye shall therefore put difference <S%H914><s%> between <S%H996><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> beasts <S%H929><s%> and unclean, <S%H2931><s%> and between <S%H996><s%> unclean <S%H2931><s%> fowls <S%H5775><s%> and clean: <S%H2889><s%> and ye shall not <S%H3808><s%> make your souls abominable <S%H8262><s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5315><s%> by beast, <S%H929><s%> or by fowl, <S%H5775><s%> or by any manner <S%H3605><s%> of living thing that creepeth <S%H7430><s%> <S%H834><s%> on the ground, <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have separated <S%H914><s%> from you as unclean. <S%H2930><s%>

And ye shall be <S%H1961><s%> holy <S%H6918><s%> unto me: for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> am holy, <S%H6918><s%> and have severed <S%H914><s%> you from <S%H4480><s%> other people, <S%H5971><s%> that ye should be <S%H1961><s%> mine.

A man <S%H376><s%> also or <S%H176><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> hath <S%H1961><s%> a familiar spirit, <S%H178><s%> or <S%H176><s%> that is a wizard, <S%H3049><s%> shall surely be put to death: <S%H4191><s%> <S%H4191><s%> they shall stone <S%H7275><s%> them with stones: <S%H68><s%> their blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be upon them.
